name: Briefify - Explains In Short
description: Briefify - Explains In Short is a concise and straightforward platform designed to provide succinct explanations and summaries of various content. Whether it's articles, web pages, or documents, Briefify aims to condense the information into easily digestible formats. With a user-friendly interface, it offers functionalities like generating summaries, extracting major points, and even translating content into Hindi. The platform's clean design and intuitive buttons make it easy for users to quickly obtain condensed insights from extensive content.
